doc.after: The Royal Armoured Corps is divided into regiments which operate main battle tanks armoured regiments and those in reconnaissance vehicles formation reconnaissance regiments Of these three regiments are designated Dragoon Guards two as Hussars two as Lancers and one as Dragoons The remaining two are the two regiments of the Royal Tank Regiment In the regular army there are six armoured regiments and four formation reconnaissance regiments 5
